metadata.title: CVE-2017-15650 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: musl libc before 1.1.17 has a buffer overflow via crafted DNS repliesbecause dns_parse_callback in network/lookup_name.c does not restrict thenumber of addresses, and thus an attacker can provide an unexpected numberby sending A records in a reply to an AAAA query.

criterions.comment: musl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
